mod.name: The Vacant
mod.description: A lost soul, bound to an artifact, is doomed to climb the Spire.

cards.name: Amethyst
cards.description:
Size 3.
At the start of your turn, thevacant:Mill 3 and lose 1 size.

cards.name: Amethyst+
cards.description:
Size 4.
At the start of your turn, thevacant:Mill 3 and lose 1 size.

cards.name: Diamond
cards.description:
Size 3.
Prevent the next time you would take damage and lose 1 size. At the start of your turn, lose 1 size.

cards.name: Diamond+
cards.description:

Prevent the next time you would take damage and lose 1 size. At the start of your turn, lose 1 size.

cards.name: Emerald

relics.name: Brass Goblet
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 2 thevacant:Void.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact with dark power.

relics.name: Locket Piece
relics.description: After a card thevacant:Ricochets, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: A reminder of a life lost. Or at least, a piece of one.

relics.name: Deathbell
relics.description: At the start of each combat, if you are thevacant:Hollow, gain 10 Temporary_HP.
relics.flavorText: The scent invokes a feeling of dread.

relics.name: Tombstone
relics.description: At the start of combat, after you draw, thevacant:Mill your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Just as we all go to the grave eventually, all cards go to the discard pile eventually.

relics.name: Bound Soul
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn if you are thevacant:Hollow.
relics.flavorText: As death closes in, the artifact's hold on you weakens, and you feel your power grow.

relics.name: Overflowing Goblet
relics.description: Replaces Brass Goblet. At the start of combat, gain 2 Artifact.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact, now overflowing with dark power.

relics.name: Polishing Rag
relics.flavorText: Shiny gems are more powerful, everyone knows this.

relics.name: Cracked Crystal Ball
relics.description: Exhausted cards return to your draw pile after 2 turns.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes magic leaking into the world is more powerful than when it is contained.

potions.name: Mining Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Gems to Mine.

keywords.name: Thevacant:amethyst
keywords.description:
Gem: Mill 3.
Loses size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:antifact
keywords.description: Negates the next buff.

keywords.name: Thevacant:chip
keywords.description: Trigger the effect and reduce the size of a Gem.

keywords.name: Thevacant:darkness
keywords.description: Whenever a debuff is applied to this target, increase its amount.

keywords.name: Thevacant:diamond
keywords.description:
Gem: Prevent the next time you would take damage and lose 1 size.
Loses size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:doom
keywords.description: Creatures take more damage for each Doom they have.

keywords.name: Thevacant:emerald
keywords.description:
Gem: Draw 1 card.
Loses size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:everyone
keywords.description: ALL enemies and you.

keywords.name: Thevacant:gem
keywords.description: Gems are Orbs that reduce in size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:heavy
keywords.description: When your deck is reshuffled, move to the bottom of the draw pile.

keywords.name: Thevacant:hollow
keywords.description: Hollow effects trigger if you are at or below 50% of your max health, OR if you have at least 2 unique debuffs.

keywords.name: Thevacant:materialize
keywords.description: If this card is Exhausted, it loses 1 Materialize at the end of your turn. Once all Materialize is lost, this card is moved to the top of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Thevacant:mill
keywords.description: Move an amount of cards from the top of your draw pile to your discard pile.

keywords.name: Thevacant:mine
keywords.description: Create an orb slot and fill it with a Gem.

keywords.name: Thevacant:onyx
keywords.description:
Gem: Apply 1 Doom to ALL enemies.
Loses size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:opal
keywords.description:
Gem: Gain [E]
Loses size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:polish
keywords.description: Increase the size of a Gem.

keywords.name: Thevacant:reap
keywords.description: Heal this much HP when you attack this target. Removed at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:return
keywords.description: Move the top playable card from your discard pile to your hand.

keywords.name: Thevacant:ricochet
keywords.description: If this card would be Milled, add it to your hand instead of the discard pile.

keywords.name: Thevacant:ruby
keywords.description:
Gem: Gain 3 Vigor.
Loses size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:sapphire
keywords.description:
Gem: Gain 3 Temperance.
Loses size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:shroud
keywords.description: Halve incoming damage. Reduced by 1 at the start of your turn, and whenever you play an attack.

keywords.name: Thevacant:temperance
keywords.description: The next time you Block, gain additional Block.

keywords.name: Thevacant:topaz
keywords.description:
Gem: Gain 1 Artifact.
Loses size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Thevacant:unnate
keywords.description: Starts each combat at the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Thevacant:void
keywords.description: When your draw pile is empty, deal more damage and gain more Block.

keywords.name: Thevacant:voidbound
keywords.description: Void affects this card regardless of if your draw pile is empty.
